Name: Puzzle Dungeon
About the game: Delve through the Puzzle Dungeon and try to retrieve the fabled Hypercube. PICK YOUR HERO Play one of 4 distinct characters, each with their own type of puzzle. The further you adventure into the dungeon, the harder each puzzle becomes. FIND LOOT Upgrade your character with sweet loot. Test your mental arithmetic, language and cognitive abilities while you adventure through the dungeon. Puzzle Dungeon is a turn-based dungeon crawler featuring classic roguelike elements: procedurally generated levels, permanent character upgrades, pixel art graphics, and permadeath.
